title: Firefox keep sugesting me the same strong password
content: Recently one of my phones was stolen so I wanted to change all my important passwords just because. But whenever I use the 'Suggest strong password' for each of my google accounts, it keeps suggesting the same password! I mean, it is not suggesting new passwords, it keeps the same suggestion for the same site (in this case myaccounts.google). I need to fix this cause I'm too lazy to create new passwords and the main point of using this tool is to help me with strong and powerful passwords to keep everything safe. Also, I have like 15 different googe accounts so I dont want to do it one per one. Please, I need a solution. I already deleted cookies and caché

I know I have not blocked this website address. Can you help give me some suggestions? Thank you.

title: Primary password and password security on desktop
content:
Hi,

I’m wondering about how Firefox protects saved passwords, specifically the difference between using a primary password and not using one.

Without a primary password, are my saved passwords stored on my device in plain text, or in a way that could be easily accessed by malware or information-stealing viruses?

If I enable the primary password, does it encrypt my saved passwords or make them inaccessible to such programs?

I’m mainly curious whether using a primary password provides a real security benefit beyond needing it to autofill.

Thanks, Aidan
creator: aidan.pawson1

title: The settings gear for the sidebar is situated near the top instead of the bottom
content: I really enjoy the new sidebar revamp, but I've had an issue with it recently that I haven't been able to find a solution for. Typically, the settings gear is supposed to be situated near the bottom of bar. However, as demonstrated in the attached image, it is at the top near the bookmarks and history buttons. I have tried reinstalling the browser from scratch, turning the sidebar on and off, turning vertical tabs on and off, and even getting rid of my custom CSS theme for a time. None of these have worked. If anyone knows what the root of this issue is, I'd really appreciate the help.
creator: medievalpsx
